title: Vox Machina Ep. 6 - Breaching the Emberhold
description: The party continues to wind its way ever downward, far below Kraghammer, making their way toward the Duergar Fortress known as Emberhold. It looms in the dim light of the caverns and many magma flows, housing both secrets...and danger.
content:encoded: The party continues to wind its way ever downward, far below Kraghammer, making their way toward the Duergar Fortress known as Emberhold. It looms in the dim light of the caverns and many magma flows, housing both secrets...and danger.
